ESME.BA.summary: Bodegas Esmeralda S.A. produces and sells wines in Argentina. It offers its products under the Esmeralda Malbec, Esmeralda Cabernet Sauvignon, Esmeralda Red Blend, and Esmeralda Chardonnay brand names; and the Estiba-I Malbec, Estiba-I Cabernet Sauvignon, Estiba-I Syrah, Estiba-I Tempranillo, Estiba-I Red Blend, Estiba-I Chardonnay, and Estiba-I Sobremadurado brands. The company also exports its products. The company is headquartered in CÃ³rdoba, Argentina. Bodegas Esmeralda S.A. is a subsidiary of Dvc Inversiones S.A.
